Source: module/bottomPage/ExtraWelfareList.js

import Native from 'commonJsDir/native.js';
import Track from 'commonJsDir/Track.js';

/**
 * 生成活动底部的额外福利
 * @class ExtraWelfareList
 */
module.exports = class ExtraWelfareList{
  /**
   * @param  {any} container - css选择符或dom对象，放置福利的容器
   * @param  {array} caseGroups - /campaign/getCampaignInfo接口返回的福利的任务文案详情
   * @static
   */
  static render(container, caseGroups){
    if(!caseGroups || !caseGroups[0])
      return;

    let missions = (caseGroups[0].campaignMissionUnits) || [],
        tmpl = '<div class="extra-welfare-list"><ul>',
        $container = $(container),
        vc = Native.allParams.vc * 1,
        showListStr = '';

    missions.forEach((item, idx)=>{
      if(vc >= item.desc * 1){
        showListStr += `<li data-pos="${idx}" data-exposure="1" data-exposure-type="welfare"><img src="${item.imgUrl}"></li>`;
      }
    });

    tmpl += showListStr + '</ul></div>';

    $container.append(tmpl);

    if(!showListStr)
      return;

    $container.find('.extra-welfare-list').delegate('li', 'click', function(evt){
      let pos = $(this).data('pos');

      Track.clickWelfare(pos + 1);
      Native.gotoAny(missions[pos]);
    })
  }
}
